name: Modern Downtown Apartment
description: A fully furnished 2-bedroom apartment located in the heart of the city with easy access to shopping centers and public transport.

name: Luxurious Suburban Home
description: A spacious 4-bedroom home with a large backyard, ideal for families. Located in a quiet neighborhood.

name: Cozy Studio Apartment
description: A compact and affordable studio apartment perfect for singles or students, located near the university.

name: Beachside Condo
description: A stunning 3-bedroom condo with ocean views, private balcony, and modern amenities.

name: Family Townhouse
description: A 3-bedroom townhouse with a small garden and parking space. Located near schools and parks.
